charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE OR DISPENSE, 21:846=CD.F - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, , 18:1956-3300.F - MONEY LAUNDERING - INTERSTATE COMMERCE

charges.charge_disposition: Deft is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 120 months as to each of Counts 1 and 2; both counts to run concurrently; the cost of incarceration fee is waived; the Court recommends that Deft participate in the BOP's 500-hour Drug Treatment Program. Deft shall be placed on Supervised Release for a term of 4 years as to Count 1, and 1 year as to Count 2; both counts to run concurrently with standard and special conditions. No fine. The Deft shall forfeit his interest in the property set forth in Section VIII of the Plea Agreement and incorporated herein. Deft to pay $200.00 mandatory assessment ($100.00 as to each of two counts), due immediately. Deft is remanded. The Court recommends that Deft be designated to a FCI Terminal Island, California. The Court further recommends that Deft serve the latter portion of his term of imprisonment on community confinement and that Deft's supervised release term be served in California. The Court grants the Govt's oral motion to dismiss the Criminal Complaint (in 14-mj-1092) as to this Deft.

The Deft shall forfeit his interest in the property set forth in Section VIII of the Plea Agreement and incorporated herein. Deft to pay $200.00 mandatory assessment ($100.00 as to each of two counts), due immediately. Deft is remanded. The Court recommends that Deft be designated to a FCI Terminal Island, California. The Court further recommends that Deft serve the latter portion of his term of imprisonment on community confinement and that Deft's supervised release term be served in California. The Court grants the Govt's oral motion to dismiss the Criminal Complaint (in 14-mj-1092) as to this Deft.
